title: (x) type on Begian highway signs - VSS
content:
anyone?  
I saw this on Swiss Highways also. And you can find it on Belgian playing cards (from Carta Mundi). Is it Belgian? Mind the very special flat 'a'.

K.

comments.content: reminds me vaguely of [brazilia seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020095923/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=203203) .. although that isn't remotely close, just thought i'd throw something out there. Anyone else? Yves?
